title: SuzyOofR
author: SuzyOofR
content: Urgently required exchangers or traders for integration into the projectFor all questions, please contact by telegram @doc_staOnly with experience,the scammers pass by.

comments.author: SuzyOofR
comments.body: Quote from: alterra57 on April 13, 2023, 01:46:30 PMMore information is needed. tg pls

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: SuzyOofR on April 13, 2023, 03:29:34 PMQuote from: alterra57 on April 13, 2023, 01:46:30 PMMore information is needed. tg plsOnly scammers insist on dealing on Telegram alone.  If you have a legitimate request, please post it here.  Otherwise, you're the one who'll be labeled a scammer.

comments.author: SuzyOofR
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on April 13, 2023, 09:10:25 PMQuote from: SuzyOofR on April 13, 2023, 03:29:34 PMQuote from: alterra57 on April 13, 2023, 01:46:30 PMMore information is needed. tg plsOnly scammers insist on dealing on Telegram alone.  If you have a legitimate request, please post it here.  Otherwise, you're the one who'll be labeled a scammer. I wrote my offer above, and before you brand me as a crook - provide the proofs

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: SuzyOofR on April 14, 2023, 06:01:09 AMQuote from: DireWolfM14 on April 13, 2023, 09:10:25 PMQuote from: SuzyOofR on April 13, 2023, 03:29:34 PMQuote from: alterra57 on April 13, 2023, 01:46:30 PMMore information is needed. tg plsOnly scammers insist on dealing on Telegram alone.  If you have a legitimate request, please post it here.  Otherwise, you're the one who'll be labeled a scammer. I wrote my offer above, and before you brand me as a crook - provide the proofsNo, your offer is not written above, you are asking people to communicate on a platform that is a known hotbed for scammers.  And I don't need to prove you're a scammer, you are already behaving like one.  Also, I didn't "brand" you a scammer...  At least not yet.
